name: Karam Foundation
description: Provides humanitarian aid, education, and opportunities to Syrian refugees, both in Syria and around the world.

name: Syrian American Medical Society (SAMS)
description: Delivers medical care and relief to those affected by the Syrian crisis, including refugees.

name: Mercy Corps
description: Provides humanitarian aid, economic opportunity, and support to Syrian refugees and communities in need.

name: International Medical Corps
description: Delivers healthcare and medical services to Syrian refugees and vulnerable populations.

name: Hand in Hand for Syria
description: Provides medical care, education, and support to Syrians affected by the conflict.

name: NuDay Syria
description: A humanitarian organization focused on women and children in Syria, offering aid and education.

name: The Syria Campaign
description: A global advocacy organization working to raise awareness and support for Syrians affected by the conflict.

name: The White Helmets (Syria Civil Defence)
description: A volunteer organization that provides emergency response and rescue operations in Syria.

name: Syrian Forum USA
description: Supports Syrians through education, health, and community development programs.

name: Syria Relief and Development
description: Offers humanitarian aid, healthcare, and development programs for Syrians.

name: The Day After
description: Focuses on post-conflict reconstruction and transitional justice in Syria.

name: Basmeh & Zeitooneh
description: Provides humanitarian aid, education, and empowerment to Syrians affected by the conflict.

name: Baytna Syria
description: Supports Syrian children and youth through education and psychosocial programs.

name: Sawa for Development and Aid
description: A non-profit organization that works on development projects and aid initiatives for Syrians.

name: The Amal Foundation
description: Aims to empower and support Syrians through education, healthcare, and economic initiatives.
